entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:10 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
